abstract: China approves trial program that will allow authorities in four regions to issue bonds amid worries that local governments are running short of cash.
snippet: A trial program will allow the authorities in four regions to issue bonds amid concerns about efforts by Beijing to tame inflation and a property bubble.
lead_paragraph: A trial program will allow the authorities in four regions to issue bonds amid concerns about efforts by Beijing to tame inflation and a property bubble.

headline.main: China to Allow Some Local Governments to Issue Bonds
headline.print_headline: Local Cash Squeeze Leads Beijing to Allow Bond Sales
